description.label: Field description
description.description: This text will be displayed in a bubble exactly like this one.

placeholder.label: Placeholder
placeholder.description: This text will be shown inside the input.

type.label: Type of value
type.description: The value will be of the type you specify

widget.label: Display mode
widget.description: Each type offers a particular display, but some offer alternatives. For example, you can force the choice of a date with the Date display.

enum.label: List of specific values
enum.description: You can impose a value from a specific selection. A drop-down menu will then be displayed to the user.

widget.default_description: A basic field related to the value type.
widget.name: {{context}}
widget.description_upload: An upload area will be displayed. The file will be uploaded to our cloud and the url will be stored as a value in your data object.
widget.description_textarea: A more comfortable writing area than a simple field.
widget.description_date: A calendar will be displayed. The value will be formatted as a date.
widget.description_enum: You choose the list of possible values. Only one of these values will be allowed.
widget.description_radio: List of values in the form of radio buttons
widget.description_slider: Select a numeric value on a slider

items.label: Items
items.description: Definition of each element of the table

allowNew.title: Allow new entries
allowNew.description: Allow additional properties, other than the listed ones

accept.title: Authorized type of files
accept.description: Defines the authorized types of files for this input. You can separate each type by a comma. A type can be defined by its MIME type as well as its extension (.pdf).
